title: Seppe Lodewijckx, Lornoy David and Duh Hung Nguyen were charged for trying to smuggle ants | National | thepress.net
text:
Seppe Lodewijckx, Lornoy David and Duh Hung Nguyen were charged for trying to smuggle ants
- Tony KARUMBA
0
Tags
As featured on
A Kenyan court on Wednesday fined four people, including two Belgian teenagers, more than $7,000 for attempting to smuggle thousands of live ants out of the country.
